Package com.projetannuel.userapi.repositories

Interface UserMediaRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserMedia,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserMedia,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<UserMedia,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<UserMedia>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserMedia,String>
@Repository public interface UserMediaRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserMedia,String>
The interface User media repository.

    • getUserCollectionByIdUser

      @Query(value="SELECT CONCAT(MEDIATYPE.SERVERURL,USERMEDIA.IDMEDIA) AS Url FROM USERMEDIA\nJOIN MEDIATYPE\n\tON MEDIATYPE.NAME = USERMEDIA.MEDIATYPE\nWHERE USERMEDIA.IDUSER = :IdUser AND USERMEDIA.COLLECTION = 1", nativeQuery=true) List<String> getUserCollectionByIdUser(@Param("IdUser") Integer idUser)
